rows.label: qst502013_msg0001
rows.name: Girl of lightning... Hold a moment.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0002
rows.name: Yes? Are you talking to me?

rows.label: qst502013_msg0003
rows.name:
You... I see you are a lightning
user of considerable skill.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0004
rows.name:
No... Actually... I can't
control it at all.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0005
rows.name: Even so, would you not show me?

rows.label: qst502013_msg0006
rows.name:
I too am a wielder of lightning,
but I have reached my limit...

rows.label: qst502013_msg0007
rows.name:
Therefore, I wish to
learn from a master.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0009
rows.name:
Such tremendous power...
I am truly impressed.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0010
rows.name:
With this power, you can
protect your comrades.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0012
rows.name: Yes. If only I had such power as you...

rows.label: qst502013_msg0013
rows.name: No... I must simply train harder.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0014
rows.name:
Thank you. Well then, I
shall be on my way...

rows.label: qst502013_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm not good enough to be
an example... I'm sorry!!
